## Endpoints interface

Definition of all API-client methods available in [context](https://docs.vuestorefront.io/v2/advanced/context.html#context-api)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Endpoints 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [exampleEndpoint(context, params)](./integration-boilerplate-api.endpoints.exampleendpoint.md) | Here you can find an example endpoint definition. Based on this example, you should define how your endpoint will look like. This description will appear in the API extractor, so try to document all endpoints added here. |
